entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
